description:
Job Description A growing health tech startup operating within the men's health space is looking to add a Product Manager to join their team. The company provides various clinical support for men to improve their health and wellness. This product manager will focus specifically on improving the internal workflows and maintaining tools for the internal team. A strong candidate should have experience interpreting API documentation and developing the product roadmap. Required Skills & Experience

  • 3+ years of experience as a Product Manager
  • Experience improving internal workflows
  • Translate needs into requirements
  • Develop product strategies
  • Strong communication and oral skills

Desired Skills & Experience

  • Experience with data visualization tools is a plus.

You Will Receive The Following Benefits

  • Medical, Dental, and Vision insurance
  • 401(K)
  • PTO
  • Options

Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a full-time basis now and in the future.

Posted By: Paul Kim
